Name: Anvil F7C-S Hornet Ghost Mk II
Description:
Manufacturer: Anvil Aerospace
Focus: Stealth Fighter
 
When approaching the Mk II redesign of the F7C-S Hornet Ghost, the engineers at Anvil Aerospace wanted to preserve what pilots loved about the low-emission drives, low-draw weapons, and Void Armor technology of the original, but refine them to an even higher level of performance for a whole new era of stealth operations.

Loadout.Name: Anvil Hornet Ghost Mk II Center Cap
